title: Hajimete Mama ni Nareta Hi
original_name: はじめてママになれた日
sinopse:
Rika was abused by her mother when she was a child. Now an adult and married, she wants to be a better mother for her new family. Soon after she has a baby, her traumatic past troubles her once more.

Included one-shot: Hitoribocchi no Houkago
